subject: Golf
Masters Golf Tournament
lead_paragraph: Mickelson’s popularity at the Masters is unmatched, and the reaction to his improved play Saturday was amplified by the fact that he had done so little leading up to this year’s tournament.
snippet: Mickelson’s popularity at the Masters is unmatched, and the reaction to his improved play Saturday was amplified by the fact that he had done so little leading up to this year’s tournament.
